ad_name: SWS | Manychat | New Mothers  | Labs you truly need
primary_text:
Mama, the labs you truly need postpartum will not be drawn by your PCP or OBGYN.

Typical Care: One quick visit with your OBGYN at 6 weeks postpartum, basic anxiety & depression screening once, general reassurance that your symptoms are "normal."

Comprehensive Postpartum Care: Full nutrition, inflammation, thyroid, and metabolic panels, in-depth analysis to identify deficiencies and imbalances, personalized care plans tailored to your unique needs.

Your PCP and OBGYN might tell you everything’s 'normal,' but they're not drawing the labs you actually need postpartum...so how do they know?

That fatigue, anxiety, low libido, and brain fog? It’s not in your head, and it’s not just 'new mom life.' It’s your body screaming for help.

You deserve real answers, not brushed-off symptoms.

Don’t let anyone tell you 'it’ll get better' without actually checking what's going on inside your body.

If you're tired of feeling ignored, it’s time to take control of your health.

DM me "RELIEF" and let’s get those labs done right. 

We’ve got your back. 💪
headline: Postpartum Care USA

alternative_copy: Did you know that mama rage, exhaustion, brain fog, and weight gain are all symptoms of nutrient depletion?   Here’s how to fix it👇  My name is Stacia Scott and not only have I gone through postpartum 3 times in 4 years, I am a Postpartum Practitioner specializing in postpartum care.  This is what I hear from my mama’s all the time…Do any of these sound familiar?  👉Exhaustion that no amount of sleep can fix?  👉Brain fog that makes even simple tasks feel overwhelming  👉Feeling like you will never have the same relationship with your husband ever again…  👉Mama Rage that leaves you snapping at your loved ones over the smallest things?  👉A body that feels unfamiliar, with stubborn weight that won’t budge?  Many of the women I work with have had their symptoms for months/years, not just for a few weeks postpartum.  Did you know that if left untreated postpartum symptoms can last up to 10 YEARS???  After helping 1000’s of mamas prevent and treat all of the above symptoms☝️, I have learned what it takes to help YOU THRIVE postpartum.  What's the key? Maternal mental and physical health through EDUCATION from a postpartum expert.  I want to help you mama! ❤️  I am now offering a FREE LIVE WORKSHOP: The Proven 3-Step M.O.M. Method to Naturally Defeat Postpartum Symptoms.  You will learn exactly how we have helped 1000+ mamas conquer postpartum symptoms naturally without using medication!   AND  Get all your burning questions answered by Stacia Scott—Postpartum Practitioner, Founder and CEO of Postpartum Care USA, keynote Speaker, author, and mom of three beautiful boys!  Spaces are limited and by joining us on a call you will receive 20% off all our packages when you prepay!   You deserve this mama! Click LEARN MORE to register! 💕💪

primary_text: Mama, your PCP/OBGYN will tell you chronic fatigue, mom brain, and low libido are “normal” after giving birth, but as postpartum experts, we’re here to tell you it’s NOT.   Every mama’s journey is unique, but after months (or even years) of feeling this way…  You *know* something just isn’t right. You *still* don’t feel like yourself, and these symptoms haven’t just “gone away” like your PCP/OBGYN promised they would. 🤔  That’s because these are all signs of Postnatal Depletion Syndrome (or PND), and not only do they affect your physical health…they can also affect your mental health, too.  But at Postpartum Care USA, we get to the root cause of these symptoms so you can get back to the root of who you are (you know…fun, vibrant, free 🤍)...  DM us “HEAL” so we can help you thrive in motherhood – not just survive!
alternative_copy: NEWSFLASH: ONE quick visit + basic lab testing with your PCP/OBGYN 6 weeks after childbirth hardly qualifies as postpartum care…but they won’t tell you that.   Instead, they’ll tell you that the unwanted weight gain, irritability with your tiny human (and your husband), chronic fatigue, and low libido are all “typical” parts of your journey.   But they aren’t.  That’s why you need more than a “typical” doctor visit that brushes your experience off as just “baby blues.”  You need comprehensive postpartum care that gives you expert support, full nutrition analysis, and personalized care plans tailored to what’s *actually* going on inside your body.   Nothing about motherhood is “typical,” and your postpartum care shouldn’t be treated that way.   DM us “HEAL” so we can help you thrive in motherhood – not just survive! ||| If your postpartum labs came back “normal,” but you’re still experiencing hair loss, weight gain, irritability, or low libido, it could mean your PCP/OBGYN isn’t drawing enough tests.  The truth is…most PCPs/OBGYNs will tell you these are typical effects of giving birth because they simply aren’t equipped to look for what *actually* matters postpartum.  Hi! 👋 I’m Stacia Scott! Not only have I gone through postpartum 3 times in 4 years but…   I’m a Nurse Practitioner specializing in postpartum care. I’ve helped 2500 mamas reclaim their physical, mental, and emotional health after giving birth because I know firsthand that basic lab tests won’t cut it.  That’s why at Postpartum Care USA, we draw 55+ labs that focus on your thyroid health, nutrient deficiencies, hormonal imbalances, metabolic panels, and so much more.   You shouldn’t have to accept things like ❌weight gain, ❌chronic fatigue, ❌low libido, or ❌mom brain as your “new normal”, mama.   I want to help you get the in-depth testing you need to get to the root of these postpartum symptoms for good.  DM me “HEAL” so I can help you thrive in motherhood – not just survive!

Have you ever witnessed that classic comedy where a dad is a one-man circus of parenting fails? Picture this: he's rocking the diaper on backward, treating the baby like a headliner at a rock concert, and scratching his head, wondering why his wife's giving him that "Did I marry the right guy?" look. 🤷  But hey, let's cut him some slack. Postpartum? It's a rollercoaster for everyone. No, seriously! 🎢  Did you know?  ⚠️1 in 10 men experience postpartum depression and anxiety issues?  ⚠️ If you have postpartum anxiety or depression that your spouse is 50% more likely to experience it themselves?  ⚠️ In a recent poll, 80% of spouses said that they were not prepared for postpartum, how to help, how to support their significant other, and how to communicate to their wives?  After surviving postpartum 3x in just 4 years, my husband and I became true postpartum pros.   We've got strategies to rock this whole postpartum thing together, and we're ready to spill the beans.  Parenthood? Not a one-person gig. You gotta be a team, on the same page, for the win. 🙌  Education is your power move, and most dads have no clue what to expect when it comes to postpartum.  I'm here to share this game-changing information with you and your husband, mama!  Please enjoy my Postpartum Dads Survival Guide – my treat to you.  This FREE GUIDE includes:  ✨Postpartum Playbook: Your partner's very own ESPN Highlight Reel from Day 1 to 12 Months postpartum, so he can be the MVP of understanding & support.  ✨Daily Game Plan: Get daily actionable steps (that prioritize mom & dad!) so you can both treasure fleeting moments with your new teammate.  ✨Mental Health Play-by-Play: A breakdown of everything he needs to know about postpartum mental health, so neither of you have to say "I'm good," when you're really not.  ✨Uncover our best-kept secrets for surviving those sleepless nights, so you can thrive during the daytime hustle.   Let’s do this mama!! 💪   👉 https://go.ppcareusa.com/ppdadguide

We can, and will, help you!!! 💕💕🙌🏼🙌🏼 We can create a customized plan for you!

primary_text: Mama…postnatal depletion syndrome is so very real and unfortunately, it’s a topic that is severely neglected. 😭💔  Most mamas have no idea what this term even means! Postnatal depletion syndrome is more that just nutrient depletion, it can also mean: hormonal, emotional, physical (etc) depletion.  Most mamas have no idea the importance of proper rest, nourishment, and supplementation postpartum…they aren’t educated on it and I don’t understand WHY!!!! PPCU is here to change that! 🙌🏼🙌🏼  Mama, we want you to understand how your hormones work, the importance of replenishing your nutrients postpartum, what supplements you need and WHY….and most importantly, we want to EDUCATE you and PREPARE you to know when something is off!!!  Mamas deserve better 🫶🏻

85% of mamas will suffer from baby blues, postpartum depression, and anxiety and it's about time we finally start to DO something about it.   After being a nurse/nurse practitioner for 13 years and helping 100’s of mamas prevent and treat postpartum depression I have learned what it takes to help a mama THRIVE postpartum.  The key? EDUCATION.   We need to educate the entire family on what to expect and how to prevent baby blues and postpartum depression.   Most mamas have prepared for their baby and for birth…  But what about preparing for beyond birth?  Even I didn't prepare the first time around. I thought I would be equipped to handle my first born and postpartum journey without support  I was so wrong!   Nothing was what I thought it would be, from labor to breastfeeding to postpartum.  Everything was SO hard!   Despite having a loving, supportive husband, I felt overwhelmed and alone.   That's when I realized postpartum care and support in our country was lacking, so I decided to change that!  After countless hours of research, podcasts, and studying international protocols, I've created a business helping mamas prevent and treat postpartum anxiety/depression.  Mama, I want to share this information with you!  Beyond Birth: Baby Blues and Postpartum Depression Online Course prepares you and your family for what to expect in the first days, weeks, and months postpartum so you do not have to struggle with postpartum depression.   You deserve to have a postpartum experience that allows you and your family to thrive, connect, and enjoy this short time with your precious new baby.   Get instant access for only $9 for a limited time >>  >>> https://go.ppcareusa.com/beyondbirth

primary_text: ead all the way to the end so I can explain...  Supplements are vital to combat postnatal depletion syndrome, but it's only one portion of the whole picture!  Mamas need high-dose supplements combined with a solid nutrition plan for at least 3-4 months to replenish what the placenta takes when delivered. Your placenta houses all your hormones and nutrients, making labs imperative to understand what exactly you are depleted in.  But, each mama is different, which is why labs are so important! This will help tell us exactly what nutrients mama needs to replace. Combine supplements, nutrition, and simple lifestyle changes, and you will have the success you need to overcome the many symptoms postpartum causes.  If you're ready to learn what supplements you need, CLICK BELOW to book your FREE ASSRSSMENT today!

primary_text: Postpartum Mamas, LISTEN UP!….  Since you had your baby, your life has never been the same again…  Your energy is drained Mental clarity is a distant memory And you always feel overwhelmed and exhausted  This cycle is making you feel isolated and helpless…  And the worst part is that it’s affecting the people around you… your partner, your friends, and even your child.  But what if you could regain your energy, mental clarity, and happiness back… in 6 months or less?  My name is Stacia Scott, I’m a nurse practitioner, postnatal expert and the owner of Postpartum Care USA!  I developed the  "M.O.M” Method… just for you.  Thats…  Maternal mental and physical health… Optimal labs/supplementation/nutrition… Manage your symptoms with a postpartum expert…  It’s the same method I’ve used to help over 500 moms just like you:  ✅ Reclaim their vitality ✅ Restore their mental alertness ✅ and Revitalize their emotional well-being  …all WITHOUT relying on medication.  The best part?  You’ll join a sisterhood of moms, who are turning their postpartum struggles into strength, just like you aim to!  You won’t feel isolated on your postpartum recovery journey again.  So if you want to leave feelings of exhaustion and isolation behind and embrace a vibrant, joyful life again…  Then click “Learn more” below to start your transformation journey with us today!

And we can share that recipe with you if you keep reading to the bottom!  When you become a new mama, you may experience what's called postpartum depletion syndrome. This often involves extreme fatigue, mood swings, and difficulty concentrating, which comes from the physical strain of pregnancy, childbirth, and caring for a newborn baby.  If a new mama doesn't receive proper support or self-care, postpartum depletion syndrome can impact a mother's well-being, as well as her ability to care for herself and her baby.  This is WHY we are here. Without proper treatment, those symptoms can worsen. Not only can they lead to long-term health issues, but they can also affect her ability to bond with her baby.  Addressing postpartum depletion syndrome early can help restore energy levels, improve mood, and support overall maternal health, helping with a smoother transition into motherhood.  If you feel like you could benefit from our help, CLICK BELOW to book your FREE ASSRSSMENT,  so we can help you feel better!

primary_text: Even though I have a loving, present husband, I was overwhelmed and quickly felt alone and uncertain about everything.  My husband wanted to help SO badly, but in the moment I had no idea what he could do for me.  Nothing was what I thought it would be…I’ve been a nurse practitioner for a total of 13 years, and I thought I would be equipped to handle my first born and postpartum journey.  I was so wrong!  From labor to breastfeeding to postpartum, I felt brand new. And I knew I couldn’t be the only new mom out there in need of help, but without the words to express how I needed my husband to show up.   So after going through postpartum 3x in 4 years my husband and I have created foolproof strategies on how to rock postpartum together.  This information will change you and your husband's postpartum journey into a beautiful tangle of stability and confidence.  INTRODUCING>> The Postpartum Dad Survival Course  There has never been ANYTHING like it!   So often new mama’s don’t even have words for their wants and needs in the first days, weeks, & months postpartum!   We’re unlocking ALL the secrets, so you can turn your hubby into the MVP of your postpartum dream team.  Here’s a sneak peek at what you can look forward to…  ✨He’ll embark on your postpartum adventure with confidence, patience, and understanding as you bounce between moments of overwhelming love and sheer exhaustion.  ✨He’ll be equipped to step-up in every way as he develops clarity around how to become the Superhero of real-life parenting.  ✨He’ll up-level his ability to communicate while unlocking the secrets to a rock solid foundation for your marriage & family.   ✨As he masters the art of being fully present for you and baby, he’ll also learn how to prioritize self care (because even superheroes need to recharge!)   Not to mention he’ll have access to our mobile app where he’ll be connected to our staff as well as hundreds of other dads (in his shoes!)  Here he’ll have a safe place to ask questions, laugh, vent, and maybe even share a new dad joke.  This course is on sale right now for $17 for a very limited time, so get your man this gift for Christmas!  Go ahead, tackle your 4th trimester TOGETHER with The Postpartum Dad's Survival Course!  Let’s do this mama! 💪

primary_text: I didn’t believe I would struggle. I was informed, educated, and by all means prepared. And yet, I found myself both isolated and overwhelmed in my 4th trimester.  I have been through postpartum 3 times in the last 4 years.   I am not only a mama, I am also a nurse practitioner trained specifically to treat mama’s during this crucial postpartum period.   My very best friend Chelsea reached out to me 5 days after delivering her sweet baby boy.  She told me that her legs were swollen and her blood pressure was high. I took one look at her and told her she needed to call her OBGYN and that she would need to go to the ER immediately.  Within 12 hours of being in the ER my friend had coded, was intubated, and was sent to the ICU.   Essentially, she went into heart failure and she had less than a 20% chance of survival…   My young, healthy best friend was about to die after giving birth to her first baby boy, what???  By the grace of god, she woke up a few days later.  From that day forward, I vowed to dedicate my life to postpartum care, education, and empower mamas so this never happens to any family again.  I have researched thousands of hours of postpartum literature, listened to dozens of podcasts, and studied supplement and nutrition protocols in other countries.  I took bits and pieces from postpartum experts to create a postpartum program unlike any other.  I want to share this information with you mama!  That’s why I am offering you my Essential Guide to Thriving After Baby!  This FREE GUIDE includes:  ✨Our Ultimate Fourth Trimester Checklist: You can check your worries at the door and cherish precious moments with your newborn.  ✨The Easiest Postpartum Food List and Snacks:  Feel nourished, energized, and fully present.   ✨Rediscover Intimacy: Our guide for postpartum couples empowers you to navigate this aspect of your relationship with confidence.  ✨Our Essential Mental Health Guide: Stay empowered and in tune with your mental wellness, so you know when it's time to embrace support.  Let’s do this mama! 💪

primary_text: 18 months postpartum and still waiting to “bounce back”?  Your OB says your labs are “normal.”  Friends say, “That’s just mom life.”  But you know better.  Because normal doesn’t feel like:  😩 Fatigue that doesn’t lift no matter how much coffee you drink. 😶‍🌫️ Brain fog so heavy you forget words mid-sentence. 💔 Libido that never came back.  Here’s the problem: most OBs only test 5–7 markers.  We test 55+.  And in over 3,300 women we’ve helped, here’s what we’ve seen:  🔎 91% had nutrient deficiencies 🔎 73% had thyroid issues 🔎 58% had inflammation that got ignored  That’s why your labs came back “fine” while you feel anything but.  DM us "RELIEF" (or comment "RELIEF" below) and we’ll help you uncover what’s really going on.

primary_text: 70% of postpartum women struggle with symptoms of postpartum depletion syndrome! Are you one of them?  My name is Stacia Scott and not only have I gone through postpartum 3 times in 4 years, I am a Nurse Practitioner specializing in postpartum care.   This is what I hear from my mama’s all the time…Do any of these sound familiar?   👉Constantly overstimulated by your tiny human(s) and your husband? 👉Difficulty resting/sleeping even if you tired down to your bones? 👉Feeling like you will never have the same relationship with your husband ever again... 👉Yelling from your mama rage and tearful at a moments notice? 👉Unable to decide what is normal in your body in this new stage of life vs what is not supposed to be happening  Many of the women I work with have had their symptoms for months/years, not just for a few weeks postpartum.  Did you know that if left untreated postpartum symptoms can last up to 10 YEARS???  After being a nurse/nurse practitioner for 13 years and helping 100’s of mamas prevent and treat all of the above symptoms☝️, I have learned what it takes to help YOU THRIVE postpartum.  What's the key?  Maternal mental and physical health through EDUCATION from a postpartum expert.   I want to help you mama! ❤️  That’s why I am offering you my 4 Essential Guides (in one!!) I didn’t believe I would struggle. I was informed, educated, and by all means prepared. And yet, I found myself both isolated and overwhelmed in my 4th trimester.  I have been through postpartum 3 times in the last 4 years.   I am not only a mama, I am also a nurse practitioner trained specifically to treat mama’s during this crucial postpartum period.   My very best friend Chelsea reached out to me 5 days after delivering her sweet baby boy.  She told me that her legs were swollen and her blood pressure was high. I took one look at her and told her she needed to call her OBGYN and that she would need to go to the ER immediately.  Within 12 hours of being in the ER my friend had coded, was intubated, and was sent to the ICU.   Essentially, she went into heart failure and she had less than a 20% chance of survival…   My young, healthy best friend was about to die after giving birth to her first baby boy, what???  By the grace of god, she woke up a few days later.  From that day forward, I vowed to dedicate my life to postpartum care, education, and empower mamas so this never happens to any family again.  I have researched thousands of hours of postpartum literature, listened to dozens of podcasts, and studied supplement and nutrition protocols in other countries.  I took bits and pieces from postpartum experts to create a postpartum program unlike any other.  I want to share this information with you mama!  That’s why I am offering you my Essential Guide to Thriving After Baby!  This FREE GUIDE includes:  ✨Our Ultimate Fourth Trimester Checklist: You can check your worries at the door and cherish precious moments with your newborn.  ✨The Easiest Postpartum Food List and Snacks:  Feel nourished, energized, and fully present.   ✨Rediscover Intimacy: Our guide for postpartum couples empowers you to navigate this aspect of your relationship with confidence.  ✨Our Essential Mental Health Guide: Stay empowered and in tune with your mental wellness, so you know when it's time to embrace support. primary_text: I didn’t believe I would struggle. I was informed, educated, and by all means prepared. And yet, I found myself both isolated and overwhelmed in my 4th trimester.  I have been through postpartum 3 times in the last 4 years.   I am not only a mama, I am also a nurse practitioner trained specifically to treat mama’s during this crucial postpartum period.   My very best friend Chelsea reached out to me 5 days after delivering her sweet baby boy.  She told me that her legs were swollen and her blood pressure was high. I took one look at her and told her she needed to call her OBGYN and that she would need to go to the ER immediately.  Within 12 hours of being in the ER my friend had coded, was intubated, and was sent to the ICU.   Essentially, she went into heart failure and she had less than a 20% chance of survival…   My young, healthy best friend was about to die after giving birth to her first baby boy, what???  By the grace of god, she woke up a few days later.  From that day forward, I vowed to dedicate my life to postpartum care, education, and empower mamas so this never happens to any family again.  I have researched thousands of hours of postpartum literature, listened to dozens of podcasts, and studied supplement and nutrition protocols in other countries.  I took bits and pieces from postpartum experts to create a postpartum program unlike any other.  I want to share this information with you mama!  That’s why I am offering you my 4 Essential Guides (in one!!) That Every Mama Must Have!   Go From Solo Survival to Fully Empowered, Thriving Mama!  This FREE GUIDE includes:  ✨Our Ultimate Fourth Trimester Checklist: Check your worries at the door and cherish precious moments with your newborn.  ✨Empower Your Postpartum Mental Health Journey: So you no longer have to say "I'm good," when you're really not.  ✨The Easiest Postpartum Food List and Snacks: Feel nourished, energized, and fully present.  ✨Rediscover Intimacy: Our guide for postpartum couples empowers you to navigate this aspect of your relationship with confidence.  Let’s do this mama! 💪

ad_name: Why I went against my doctors advice
primary_text: Tired of your MD telling you your symptoms are “normal” postpartum? You do not have to suffer in silence.  My name is Stacia Scott and not only have I gone through postpartum 3 times in 4 years, I am a Postpartum Practitioner specializing in postpartum care.  This is what I hear from my mama’s all the time…Do any of these sound familiar?  👉Exhaustion that no amount of sleep can fix?  👉Brain fog that makes even simple tasks feel overwhelming  👉Feeling like you will never have the same relationship with your husband ever again…  👉Mama Rage that leaves you snapping at your loved ones over the smallest things?  👉A body that feels unfamiliar, with stubborn weight that won’t budge?  Many of the women I work with have had their symptoms for months/years, not just for a few weeks postpartum.  Did you know that if left untreated postpartum symptoms can last up to 10 YEARS???  After helping 1000’s of mamas prevent and treat all of the above symptoms☝️, I have learned what it takes to help YOU THRIVE postpartum.  What's the key? Maternal mental and physical health through EDUCATION from a postpartum expert.  I want to help you mama! ❤️  I am now offering a FREE LIVE WORKSHOP: The Proven 3-Step M.O.M. Method to Naturally Defeat Postpartum Symptoms.  You will learn exactly how we have helped 1000+ mamas conquer postpartum symptoms naturally without using medication   AND  Get all of your burning questions answered by a Postpartum Practitioner!   Spaces are limited and by joining us on a call you will receive 20% off all our packages when you prepay!   You deserve this mama! Click LEARN MORE to register! 💕💪

primary_text: 14-24 months postpartum and still waiting to “bounce back”?  Your OB says your labs are “normal.”  Friends say, “That’s just mom life.”  But you know better.  Because normal doesn’t feel like:  😩 Fatigue that doesn’t lift no matter how much coffee you drink. 😶‍🌫️ Brain fog so heavy you forget words mid-sentence. 💔 Libido that never came back.  Here’s the problem: most OBs only test 5–7 markers.  We test 55+.  And in over 3,300 women we’ve helped, here’s what we’ve seen:  🔎 91% had nutrient deficiencies 🔎 73% had thyroid issues 🔎 58% had inflammation that got ignored  That’s why your labs came back “fine” while you feel anything but.  If you'd like to uncover what’s really going on, DM us HEAL to get started. Tap the button on this ad, then hit send, and our team will follow up shortly to walk you through the program and help you book your first assessment.

primary_text: Mama, your PCP/OBGYN will tell you chronic fatigue, mom brain, and low libido are “normal” after giving birth, but as postpartum experts, we’re here to tell you it’s NOT.   Every mama’s journey is unique, but after months (or even years) of feeling this way…  You *know* something just isn’t right. You *still* don’t feel like yourself, and these symptoms haven’t just “gone away” like your PCP/OBGYN promised they would. 🤔  That’s because these are all signs of Postnatal Depletion Syndrome (or PND), and not only do they affect your physical health…they can also affect your mental health, too.  But at Postpartum Care USA, we get to the root cause of these symptoms so you can get back to the root of who you are (you know…fun, vibrant, free 🤍)...  DM us “HEAL” so we can help you thrive in motherhood – not just survive!

primary_text:
Are you 6, 12, or even 18+ months postpartum and still experiencing mama rage, chronic fatigue, low libido, or hair loss? It’s time to get the help you NEED!

Mama, I know investing in yourself feels hard when you’re already struggling through so many side effects of postnatal depletion. 

But your kiddos need you to start advocating to get the help you need (and they deserve)…

We’ve been conditioned to believe that postpartum recovery is only 6 weeks long, when in reality – it can go on for YEARS if left untreated. 😣

How you feel today (and have felt for the last few months) doesn’t feel like the woman, mama, or wife you want to be, so how much is it costing you to just accept this as “normal”?

I can tell you…

It’s stripping you of your chance to show your tiny humans the power of self-love and resilience.

It’s forcing you to miss out on precious moments where you’re fully engaged with your family because the physical, mental, and emotional effects of postpartum bog you down. 

But here's the thing…

Healthy moms raise healthy kiddos, and healthy wives live in healthy homes. Period.

That’s why we’re creating generational health for postpartum moms.

Many of the mamas in our community start feeling better in as little as 30 days, and you deserve that, too. 

You deserve to feel strong and energetic. 

You deserve the mental clarity to focus on things you enjoy again (remember when you used to LOVE going to brunch?! 😍) 

You deserve to feel like yourself again, Mama, and my team will advocate for you all the way. 

This is a short-term investment for the long-term health benefits you, your tiny humans, and even your husband deserve. 

Let’s find out what’s really going on in your body so you can get back to your *real* normal. 

Click the button on this ad and book your Virtual Health Assessment today!
headline: 2500 Mamas Thriving Postpartum
alternative_copy:
You deserve postpartum care that’s stress-free and won’t break your bank.

That’s why at Postpartum Care USA, we offer a 100% money-back guarantee. 

We know how stressful, frustrating, and even dangerous it is for your overall well-being to constantly be told by your PCP/OBGYN that what you’re experiencing postpartum is “normal.”

We also know that at this point, you’re not sure if more testing is even worth it. 

But I want to personally assure you that it is. 

“This isn’t a bandaid. Stacia and Sarah have helped me more than my OBGYN ever thought about helping. They help you heal so you can feel empowered and enjoy postpartum.” ⭐

Your PCP/OBGYN means well when they tell you that what you’re experiencing is just part of being a mom.

But deep down, you KNOW something is off, and that Zoloft prescription isn’t doing a thing.

It’s time for you to get the care you need and the relief you deserve. 

Don’t let another PCP/OBGYN write your symptoms off as “normal.”

Instead, book a virtual health assessment with us so we can take a postpartum-specific, customized approach to helping you achieve optimal physical, mental, and emotional health.

Listen, mama, at Postpartum Care USA, we know that recovery is about more than working through anxiety and depression.

It’s about analyzing the signs your body is showing us and helping you find long-lasting relief with the right labs, nutrition, and targeted supplements. 

It’s about taking a whole-body approach to feel like the whole woman you are.

primary_text: Are you wondering what the heck an adrenal cocktail is?! We love them here at PPCU because they are such an easy and tasty way to support your minerals. 👏🏼  The basic building blocks of an adrenal cocktail are: -A juice with natural vitamin C, typically orange, pineapple, or other citrus juices. -Coconut water as a source of electrolytes and minerals, such as potassium. -A healthy pinch of salt for trace minerals and electrolytes.  Can help with: Unexplained fatigue Weight gain (especially around the abdominals) Sleep disturbance Mood swings A heightened sensitivity to stress A dysregulated nervous system  There are many different recipes available, along with premade mixtures that consist of: sodium, potassium, and whole food vitamin C 🤍  What is your favorite adrenal cocktail recipe?! Let us know in the comments!!!!

primary_text: I am so tired of hearing mamas say that they are “FINE” postpartum.  85% of mamas will suffer from baby blues, postpartum depression, and anxiety, and it's about time we finally start to DO something about it.   After being a nurse/nurse practitioner for 13 years and helping 100’s of mamas prevent and treat postpartum depression, I have learned what it takes to help YOU THRIVE postpartum.  What's the key?  Maternal mental and physical health through EDUCATION from a postpartum expert.    We educate the entire family on what to expect and how to prepare for and significantly reduce the symptoms of baby blues and postpartum depression, and make maternal mental health a priority!  I've uncovered the secrets to thriving during postpartum and I've put them all inside my courses.     Most mamas have prepared for their baby and for birth… and we love that!  BUT what about preparing for beyond birth?  Even I didn't prepare the first time around. I thought I would be equipped to handle my first born and postpartum journey without support.  I was so wrong!   Nothing was what I thought it would be, from labor to breastfeeding to postpartum symptoms.  Everything was SO hard!   Despite having a loving, supportive husband, I felt overwhelmed, scared, and utterly alone.   That's when I realized postpartum care and support in our country was lacking, so I decided to change that!  After months and months of research, diving into the data, and studying international protocols, I've created a business helping moms prevent and treat postpartum anxiety/depression.  Mama, I want to share this information with you!  Beyond Birth: Baby Blues and Postpartum Depression Online Course prepares you and your family for what to expect in the first days, weeks, and months postpartum, so you do not have to struggle with postpartum depression, anxiety or that feeling of being alone.  We are here for you.   You deserve to have a postpartum experience that allows you and your family to thrive, connect, and enjoy this short time with your precious new baby.  Get instant access for only $9 for a limited time >>  https://go.ppcareusa.com/beyondbirth

primary_text: Having a baby is life-changing… from the moment your test turns positive to hearing their first cry and beyond.  It’s a journey with one constant: CHANGE.  And while this change brings joy and new experiences, it can also leave you feeling exhausted, overwhelmed, and far from your pre-baby self…  …The energetic, vibrant woman you always known for years…  You used to be able to tackle any challenge with enthusiasm, but now you’re struggling to get through the day.  You used to be able to enjoy gatherings and outings, but now you’re too tired to leave the house.  And you used to be able to focus and think clearly, but now you’re coping with mental fog and forgetfulness.  You’re not alone.   Many new moms experience these feelings, not just physically, but emotionally and mentally as well.  And without proper support, this can lead to long-term health issues.  My name is Stacia Scott, I’m a nurse practitioner, postnatal expert and the owner of Postpartum Care USA!  I created the "M.O.M" Method—a completely medication-free approach to postpartum recovery in 6 months or less, designed to significantly reduce your current symptoms and prevent others from occurring…  It’s the same method I’ve used to help over 500 moms just like you:  ✅ Reclaim their vitality ✅ Restore their mental alertness ✅ and Restore their emotional well-being  A step-by-step program to help you regain your sense of self…  From initial consultation to personalized follow-ups…  We guide you every step of the (medication-free) way, ensuring you receive comprehensive care tailored to your specific needs.  And the best part?  You’ll join a thriving community of moms who understand your struggle and celebrate your recovery milestones together.  So if you want to turn your postpartum journey into a story of empowerment…  Then click 'Learn more' below to start your transformation with us today!

Mama, your PCP/OBGYN will tell you chronic fatigue, mom brain, and low libido are “normal” after giving birth, but as postpartum experts, we’re here to tell you it’s NOT.   Every mama’s journey is unique, but after months (or even years) of feeling this way…  You *know* something just isn’t right. You *still* don’t feel like yourself, and these symptoms haven’t just “gone away” like your PCP/OBGYN promised they would. 🤔  That’s because these are all signs of Postnatal Depletion Syndrome (or PND), and not only do they affect your physical health…they can also affect your mental health, too.  But at Postpartum Care USA, we get to the root cause of these symptoms so you can get back to the root of who you are (you know…fun, vibrant, free 🤍)...  DM us “HEAL” so we can help you thrive in motherhood – not just survive!

But they aren’t.  That’s why you need more than a “typical” doctor visit that brushes your experience off as just “baby blues.”  You need comprehensive postpartum care that gives you expert support, full nutrition analysis, and personalized care plans tailored to what’s *actually* going on inside your body.   Nothing about motherhood is “typical,” and your postpartum care shouldn’t be treated that way. primary_text: Treating thyroid issues postpartum means looking into the root cause…  And this is exactly what we do! Just DM "REVIVE" below.  Postpartum, the imbalance of progesterone and estrogen causes thyroid dysregulation, affected further by cortisol levels. Chronic stress reduces progesterone, impacting thyroid health. Your thyroid thrives on nourishing foods, vitamin D, and iron, and dislikes fasting and chronic stress.  Effective treatment involves more than hormone replacement or supplements. We address the causes, stressors, and nutritional needs to restore optimal thyroid function. Postpartum women deserve comprehensive thyroid care.   DM me "REVIVE" so we can get your thyroid back on track naturally postpartum.

primary_text: I am so tired of hearing mamas say that they are “FINE” postpartum.  85% of mamas will suffer from baby blues, postpartum depression, and anxiety and it's about time we finally start to DO something about it.   After being a nurse/nurse practitioner for 13 years and helping 100’s of mamas prevent and treat postpartum depression I have learned what it takes to help a mama THRIVE postpartum.  The key? EDUCATION.   We need to educate the entire family on what to expect and how to prevent baby blues and postpartum depression.   Most mamas have prepared for their baby and for birth…  But what about preparing for beyond birth?  Even I didn't prepare the first time around. I thought I would be equipped to handle my first born and postpartum journey without support  I was so wrong!   Nothing was what I thought it would be, from labor to breastfeeding to postpartum.  Everything was SO hard!   Despite having a loving, supportive husband, I felt overwhelmed and alone.   That's when I realized postpartum care and support in our country was lacking, so I decided to change that!  After countless hours of research, podcasts, and studying international protocols, I've created a business helping mamas prevent and treat postpartum anxiety/depression.  Mama, I want to share this information with you!  Beyond Birth: Baby Blues and Postpartum Depression Online Course prepares you and your family for what to expect in the first days, weeks, and months postpartum so you do not have to struggle with postpartum depression.   You deserve to have a postpartum experience that allows you and your family to thrive, connect, and enjoy this short time with your precious new baby.   Get instant access for only $9 for a limited time >>  >>> https://go.ppcareusa.com/beyondbirth

primary_text: Have you ever witnessed that classic comedy where a dad is a one-man circus of parenting fails? Picture this: he's rocking the diaper on backward, treating the baby like a headliner at a rock concert, and scratching his head, wondering why his wife's giving him that "Did I marry the right guy?" look. 🤷  But hey, let's cut him some slack. Postpartum? It's a rollercoaster for everyone. No, seriously! 🎢  Did you know?  ⚠️1 in 10 men experience postpartum depression and anxiety issues?  ⚠️ If you have postpartum anxiety or depression that your spouse is 50% more likely to experience it themselves?  ⚠️ In a recent poll, 80% of spouses said that they were not prepared for postpartum, how to help, how to support their significant other, and how to communicate to their wives?  After surviving postpartum 3x in just 4 years, my husband and I became true postpartum pros.   We've got strategies to rock this whole postpartum thing together, and we're ready to spill the beans.  Parenthood? Not a one-person gig. You gotta be a team, on the same page, for the win. 🙌  Education is your power move, and most dads have no clue what to expect when it comes to postpartum.  I'm here to share this game-changing information with you and your husband, mama!  Please enjoy my Postpartum Dads Survival Guide – my treat to you.  This FREE GUIDE includes:  ✨Postpartum Playbook: Your partner's very own ESPN Highlight Reel from Day 1 to 12 Months postpartum, so he can be the MVP of understanding & support.  ✨Daily Game Plan: Get daily actionable steps (that prioritize mom & dad!) so you can both treasure fleeting moments with your new teammate.  ✨Mental Health Play-by-Play: A breakdown of everything he needs to know about postpartum mental health, so neither of you have to say "I'm good," when you're really not.  ✨Uncover our best-kept secrets for surviving those sleepless nights, so you can thrive during the daytime hustle.  Let’s do this mama!! 💪  👉 https://go.ppcareusa.com/ppdadguide

primary_text: Feeling lost in the whirlwind of postpartum challenges and struggling to prioritize yourself? You're not alone…   My name is Stacia Scott and not only have I gone through postpartum 3 times in 4 years, I am a Nurse Practitioner specializing in postpartum care.   This is what I hear from my mama’s all the time…Do any of these sound familiar?   👉Constantly overstimulated by your tiny human(s) and your husband? 👉Difficulty resting/sleeping even if you tired down to your bones? 👉Feeling like you will never have the same relationship with your husband ever again... 👉Yelling from your mama rage and tearful at a moments notice? 👉Unable to decide what is normal in your body in this new stage of life vs what is not supposed to be happening  Many of the women I work with have had their symptoms for months/years, not just for a few weeks postpartum.  Did you know that if left untreated postpartum symptoms can last up to 10 YEARS???  After being a nurse/nurse practitioner for 13 years and helping 100’s of mamas prevent and treat all of the above symptoms☝️, I have learned what it takes to help YOU THRIVE postpartum.  What's the key?  Maternal mental and physical health through EDUCATION from a postpartum expert.   I want to help you mama! ❤️  That’s why I am offering you my 4 Essential Guides (in one!!) That Every Mama Must Have!   Go From Solo Survival to Fully Empowered, Thriving Mama!  This FREE GUIDE includes:  ✨Our Ultimate Fourth Trimester Checklist: Check your worries at the door and cherish precious moments with your newborn.  ✨Empower Your Postpartum Mental Health Journey: So you no longer have to say "I'm good," when you're really not.  ✨The Easiest Postpartum Food List and Snacks: Feel nourished, energized, and fully present.  ✨Rediscover Intimacy: Our guide for postpartum couples empowers you to navigate this aspect of your relationship with confidence.  Let’s do this mama!! 💪  👉 https://go.ppcareusa.com/ppesstentials-guide

Nothing was what I thought it would be…I’ve been a nurse practitioner for a total of 13 years, and I thought I would be equipped to handle my first born and postpartum journey.  I was so wrong!   Nothing was what I thought it would be, from labor to breastfeeding to postpartum.  Everything was SO hard!   Even though I have a loving, present, and supportive husband, I was overwhelmed and quickly felt alone and uncertain about everything.   I then realized postpartum care and support in our country was severely lacking, so I decided to change that!  I have researched thousands of hours of postpartum literature, listened to dozens of podcasts, and studied supplement and nutrition protocols in other countries.  I took bits and pieces from postpartum experts to create a postpartum program unlike any other.  I want to share this information with you mama!  Postpartum Care USA is designed to prepare you with education and coaching for your postpartum body, mind, and soul, in order to find beautiful stability and confidence to tackle that 4th trimester. primary_text: Treating thyroid issues postpartum means looking into the root cause…  And this is exactly what we do! Just DM "CARE" below.  Postpartum, the imbalance of progesterone and estrogen causes thyroid dysregulation, affected further by cortisol levels. Chronic stress reduces progesterone, impacting thyroid health. Your thyroid thrives on nourishing foods, vitamin D, and iron, and dislikes fasting and chronic stress.  Effective treatment involves more than hormone replacement or supplements. We address the causes, stressors, and nutritional needs to restore optimal thyroid function. Postpartum women deserve comprehensive thyroid care.   DM me "CARE" so we can get your thyroid back on track naturally postpartum.

primary_text: I am so tired of hearing mamas say that they are “FINE” postpartum.  85% of mamas will suffer from baby blues, postpartum depression, and anxiety, and it's about time we finally start to DO something about it.   After being a nurse/nurse practitioner for 13 years and helping 100’s of mamas prevent and treat postpartum depression, I have learned what it takes to help YOU THRIVE postpartum.  What's the key?  Maternal mental and physical health through EDUCATION from a postpartum expert.    We educate the entire family on what to expect and how to prepare for and significantly reduce the symptoms of baby blues and postpartum depression, and make maternal mental health a priority!  I've uncovered the secrets to thriving during postpartum and I've put them all inside my courses.     Most mamas have prepared for their baby and for birth… and we love that!  BUT what about preparing for beyond birth?  Even I didn't prepare the first time around. I thought I would be equipped to handle my first born and postpartum journey without support.  I was so wrong!   Nothing was what I thought it would be, from labor to breastfeeding to postpartum symptoms.  Everything was SO hard!   Despite having a loving, supportive husband, I felt overwhelmed, scared, and utterly alone.   That's when I realized postpartum care and support in our country was lacking, so I decided to change that!  After months and months of research, diving into the data, and studying international protocols, I've created a business helping moms prevent and treat postpartum anxiety/depression.  Mama, I want to share this information with you!  Beyond Birth: Baby Blues and Postpartum Depression Online Course prepares you and your family for what to expect in the first days, weeks, and months postpartum, so you do not have to struggle with postpartum depression, anxiety or that feeling of being alone.  We are here for you.   You deserve to have a postpartum experience that allows you and your family to thrive, connect, and enjoy this short time with your precious new baby.  Get instant access for only $9 for a limited time >>  https://go.ppcareusa.com/beyondbirth

primary_text: Postnatal depletion syndrome is so real, mama 💔 PPCU can help you navigate this! We want you to thrive in motherhood.  Symptoms include: - fatigue - mood swings - “mom brain” - irritability - hormone issues - low libido - PPD / PPA - rage - thyroid issues - emotional exhaustion & more  PDS will look different in every mama, but please do not let anyone tell you feeling terrible is just normal “motherhood”…it’s not, mama. It’s so much more than that— and you deserve to feel your best 🤍

When to request blood work postpartum? This is crucial for your health and recovery, and we have all the answers if you continue reading.  Around 8-10 weeks is ideal, but be aware that standard labs often fall short, and most, if not all providers will not draw the full lab panels that are needed for you to understand root cause issues in your body.  Many providers don't draw the necessary tests because they do not know what to look for, how to interpret the results, or don't want the responsibility of what the results may be.  Don't settle for "you're fine!" or "your labs are normal." Advocate for comprehensive blood work to get a full picture of your postpartum health.   DM me "HEALTH" to get the support and care you deserve!

primary_text: 85% of mamas will suffer from baby blues, postpartum depression, and anxiety and it's about time we finally start to DO something about it. EDUCATION.   We need to educate the entire family on what to expect and how to prevent baby blues and postpartum depression.   Most mamas have prepared for their baby and for birth…  But what about preparing for beyond birth?  Even I didn't prepare the first time around. I thought I would be equipped to handle my first born and postpartum journey without support  I was so wrong!   Nothing was what I thought it would be, from labor to breastfeeding to postpartum.  Everything was SO hard!   Despite having a loving, supportive husband, I felt overwhelmed and alone.   That's when I realized postpartum care and support in our country was lacking, so I decided to change that! primary_text: I am so tired of hearing mamas say that they are “FINE” postpartum.  85% of mamas will suffer from baby blues, postpartum depression, and anxiety, and it's about time we finally start to DO something about it.   After being a nurse/nurse practitioner for 13 years and helping 100’s of mamas prevent and treat postpartum depression, I have learned what it takes to help YOU THRIVE postpartum.  What's the key?  Maternal mental and physical health through EDUCATION from a postpartum expert.    We educate the entire family on what to expect and how to prepare for and significantly reduce the symptoms of baby blues and postpartum depression, and make maternal mental health a priority!  I've uncovered the secrets to thriving during postpartum and I've put them all inside my courses.     Most mamas have prepared for their baby and for birth… and we love that!  BUT what about preparing for beyond birth?  Even I didn't prepare the first time around. I thought I would be equipped to handle my first born and postpartum journey without support.  I was so wrong!   Nothing was what I thought it would be, from labor to breastfeeding to postpartum symptoms.  Everything was SO hard!   Despite having a loving, supportive husband, I felt overwhelmed, scared, and utterly alone.   That's when I realized postpartum care and support in our country was lacking, so I decided to change that!  After months and months of research, diving into the data, and studying international protocols, I've created a business helping moms prevent and treat postpartum anxiety/depression.  Mama, I want to share this information with you!  Beyond Birth: Baby Blues and Postpartum Depression Online Course prepares you and your family for what to expect in the first days, weeks, and months postpartum, so you do not have to struggle with postpartum depression, anxiety or that feeling of being alone.  We are here for you.   You deserve to have a postpartum experience that allows you and your family to thrive, connect, and enjoy this short time with your precious new baby.  Get instant access for only $9 for a limited time >>  https://go.ppcareusa.com/beyondbirth

alternative_copy: Are you 6, 12, or even 18+ months postpartum and still experiencing mama rage, chronic fatigue, low libido, or hair loss? It’s time to get the help you NEED!  Mama, I know investing in yourself feels hard when you’re already struggling through so many side effects of postnatal depletion.   But your kiddos need you to start advocating to get the help you need (and they deserve)…  We’ve been conditioned to believe that postpartum recovery is only 6 weeks long, when in reality – it can go on for YEARS if left untreated. 😣  How you feel today (and have felt for the last few months) doesn’t feel like the woman, mama, or wife you want to be, so how much is it costing you to just accept this as “normal”?  I can tell you…  It’s stripping you of your chance to show your tiny humans the power of self-love and resilience.  It’s forcing you to miss out on precious moments where you’re fully engaged with your family because the physical, mental, and emotional effects of postpartum bog you down.   But here's the thing…  Healthy moms raise healthy kiddos, and healthy wives live in healthy homes. Period.  That’s why we’re creating generational health for postpartum moms.  Many of the mamas in our community start feeling better in as little as 30 days, and you deserve that, too.   You deserve to feel strong and energetic.   You deserve the mental clarity to focus on things you enjoy again (remember when you used to LOVE going to brunch?! 😍)   You deserve to feel like yourself again, Mama, and my team will advocate for you all the way.   This is a short-term investment for the long-term health benefits you, your tiny humans, and even your husband deserve.   Let’s find out what’s really going on in your body so you can get back to your *real* normal.   Click the button on this ad and book your Virtual Health Assessment today!

primary_text: Treating thyroid issues postpartum means looking into the root cause…  And this is exactly what we do! Just DM "REVIVE" below.  Postpartum, the imbalance of progesterone and estrogen causes thyroid dysregulation, affected further by cortisol levels. Chronic stress reduces progesterone, impacting thyroid health. Your thyroid thrives on nourishing foods, vitamin D, and iron, and dislikes fasting and chronic stress.  Effective treatment involves more than hormone replacement or supplements. We address the causes, stressors, and nutritional needs to restore optimal thyroid function. Postpartum women deserve comprehensive thyroid care.   DM me "REVIVE" so we can get your thyroid back on track naturally postpartum.

ad_name: New copy + Symptoms you shouldn't ignore - Copy
primary_text:
Are you 6, 12, or even 18+ months postpartum and still experiencing mama rage, chronic fatigue, low libido, or hair loss? It’s time to get the help you NEED!

Mama, I know investing in yourself feels hard when you’re already struggling through so many side effects of postnatal depletion. 

But your kiddos need you to start advocating to get the help you need (and they deserve)…

We’ve been conditioned to believe that postpartum recovery is only 6 weeks long, when in reality – it can go on for YEARS if left untreated. 😣

How you feel today (and have felt for the last few months) doesn’t feel like the woman, mama, or wife you want to be, so how much is it costing you to just accept this as “normal”?

I can tell you…

It’s stripping you of your chance to show your tiny humans the power of self-love and resilience.

It’s forcing you to miss out on precious moments where you’re fully engaged with your family because the physical, mental, and emotional effects of postpartum bog you down. 

But here's the thing…

Healthy moms raise healthy kiddos, and healthy wives live in healthy homes. Period.

That’s why we’re creating generational health for postpartum moms.

headline: [FREE WORKSHOP] Defeat Postpartum Symptoms Naturally

primary_text: I didn’t believe I would struggle. I was informed, educated, and by all means prepared. And yet, I found myself both isolated and overwhelmed in my 4th trimester.  I have been through postpartum 3 times in the last 4 years.   I am not only a mama, I am also a nurse practitioner trained specifically to treat mama’s during this crucial postpartum period.   My very best friend Chelsea reached out to me 5 days after delivering her sweet baby boy.  She told me that her legs were swollen and her blood pressure was high. I took one look at her and told her she needed to call her OBGYN and that she would need to go to the ER immediately.  Within 12 hours of being in the ER my friend had coded, was intubated, and was sent to the ICU.   Essentially, she went into heart failure and she had less than a 20% chance of survival…   My young, healthy best friend was about to die after giving birth to her first baby boy, what???  By the grace of god, she woke up a few days later.  From that day forward, I vowed to dedicate my life to postpartum care, education, and empower mamas so this never happens to any family again.  I have researched thousands of hours of postpartum literature, listened to dozens of podcasts, and studied supplement and nutrition protocols in other countries.  I took bits and pieces from postpartum experts to create a postpartum program unlike any other.  I want to share this information with you mama!  That’s why I am offering you my 4 Essential Guides (in one!!) That Every Mama Must Have!   Go From Solo Survival to Fully Empowered, Thriving Mama!  This FREE GUIDE includes:  ✨Our Ultimate Fourth Trimester Checklist: Check your worries at the door and cherish precious moments with your newborn.  ✨Empower Your Postpartum Mental Health Journey: So you no longer have to say "I'm good," when you're really not.  ✨The Easiest Postpartum Food List and Snacks: Feel nourished, energized, and fully present.  ✨Rediscover Intimacy: Our guide for postpartum couples empowers you to navigate this aspect of your relationship with confidence.  Let’s do this mama! 💪

primary_text: I am so tired of hearing mamas say that they are “FINE” postpartum.  85% of mamas will suffer from baby blues, postpartum depression, and anxiety, and it's about time we finally start to DO something about it.   After being a nurse/nurse practitioner for 13 years and helping 100’s of mamas prevent and treat postpartum depression, I have learned what it takes to help YOU THRIVE postpartum.  What's the key?  Maternal mental and physical health through EDUCATION from a postpartum expert.    We educate the entire family on what to expect and how to prepare for and significantly reduce the symptoms of baby blues and postpartum depression, and make maternal mental health a priority!  I've uncovered the secrets to thriving during postpartum and I've put them all inside my courses.     Most mamas have prepared for their baby and for birth… and we love that!  BUT what about preparing for beyond birth?  Even I didn't prepare the first time around. I thought I would be equipped to handle my first born and postpartum journey without support.  I was so wrong!   Nothing was what I thought it would be, from labor to breastfeeding to postpartum symptoms.  Everything was SO hard!   Despite having a loving, supportive husband, I felt overwhelmed, scared, and utterly alone.   That's when I realized postpartum care and support in our country was lacking, so I decided to change that!  After months and months of research, diving into the data, and studying international protocols, I've created a business helping moms prevent and treat postpartum anxiety/depression.  Mama, I want to share this information with you!  Beyond Birth: Baby Blues and Postpartum Depression Online Course prepares you and your family for what to expect in the first days, weeks, and months postpartum, so you do not have to struggle with postpartum depression, anxiety or that feeling of being alone.  We are here for you.   You deserve to have a postpartum experience that allows you and your family to thrive, connect, and enjoy this short time with your precious new baby.  Get instant access for only $9 for a limited time >>  https://go.ppcareusa.com/beyondbirth

We can help you on your postpartum journey, too. Listen all the way to the end.  Courtney came to us when no one else would listen to her. Stay tuned for an interview with Courtney as she shares her story and journey with postpartum. Have you ever witnessed that classic comedy where a dad is a one-man circus of parenting fails? No, seriously! 🎢  Did you know?  ⚠️1 in 10 men experience postpartum depression and anxiety issues?  ⚠️ If you have postpartum anxiety or depression that your spouse is 50% more likely to experience it themselves?  ⚠️  80% of spouses said that they were not prepared for postpartum, how to help, how to support their significant other, and how to communicate to their wives?  After surviving postpartum 3x in just 4 years, my husband and I became true postpartum pros.   We've got strategies to rock this whole postpartum thing together, and we're ready to spill the beans. Let me be clear on this... we can HELP!  New mamas often aren't told that childbirth depletes their bodies of crucial nutrients. This means many don't realize they need to replenish these nutrients.  Every mama is different, but the top 3 nutrients we commonly see depleted in postpartum blood work are Vitamin D, ferritin, and magnesium. 🌸  If you are depleted of these nutrients, you might have symptoms such as:  **Vitamin D: •Fatigue •Mood changes, including depression •Thyroid issues •Increased risk of infections •Bone & back pain  **Ferritin (Iron Stores): •Extreme fatigue & weakness •Dizziness or lightheadedness •Cold hands & feet •Brittle nails & hair loss •Pale skin •Short of breath  **Magnesium: •Fatigue & weakness •Anxiety & depression •Hormone instability •Mood swings •Insomnia •Muscle soreness (particularly in neck and shoulders)  If you're feeling any of these after giving birth (even up to 10 years after!) CLICK BELOW to book your FREE ASSRSSMENT,  so we can help you feel better!

I didn’t believe I would struggle. I was informed, educated, and by all means prepared. And yet, I found myself both isolated and overwhelmed in my 4th trimester.  I have been through postpartum 3 times in the last 4 years.   I am not only a mama, I am also a nurse practitioner trained specifically to treat mama’s during this crucial postpartum period.   My very best friend Chelsea reached out to me 5 days after delivering her sweet baby boy.  She told me that her legs were swollen and her blood pressure was high. I took one look at her and told her she needed to call her OBGYN and that she would need to go to the ER immediately.  Within 12 hours of being in the ER my friend had coded, was intubated, and was sent to the ICU.   Essentially, she went into heart failure and she had less than a 20% chance of survival…   My young, healthy best friend was about to die after giving birth to her first baby boy, what???  By the grace of god, she woke up a few days later.  From that day forward, I vowed to dedicate my life to postpartum care, education, and empower mamas so this never happens to any family again.  I have researched thousands of hours of postpartum literature, listened to dozens of podcasts, and studied supplement and nutrition protocols in other countries.  I took bits and pieces from postpartum experts to create a postpartum program unlike any other.  I want to share this information with you mama!  That’s why I am offering you my 4 Essential Guides (in one!!) That Every Mama Must Have!   Go From Solo Survival to Fully Empowered, Thriving Mama!  This FREE GUIDE includes:  ✨Our Ultimate Fourth Trimester Checklist: Check your worries at the door and cherish precious moments with your newborn.  ✨Empower Your Postpartum Mental Health Journey: So you no longer have to say "I'm good," when you're really not.  ✨The Easiest Postpartum Food List and Snacks: Feel nourished, energized, and fully present.  ✨Rediscover Intimacy: Our guide for postpartum couples empowers you to navigate this aspect of your relationship with confidence.  Let’s do this mama! 💪

Mama, your PCP/OBGYN will tell you chronic fatigue, mom brain, and low libido are “normal” after giving birth, but as postpartum experts, we’re here to tell you it’s NOT. primary_text: Mom brain, overstimulation, exhaustion, overwhelm, mama rage…these symptoms are not normal mama! This is what I hear from my mama’s all the time…Do any of these sound familiar?   👉Constantly overstimulated by your tiny human(s) and your husband? 👉Difficulty resting/sleeping even if you tired down to your bones? 👉Feeling like you will never have the same relationship with your husband ever again... 👉Yelling from your mama rage and tearful at a moments notice? 👉Unable to decide what is normal in your body in this new stage of life vs what is not supposed to be happening  Many of the women I work with have had their symptoms for months/years, not just for a few weeks postpartum. Have you ever witnessed that classic comedy where a dad is a one-man circus of parenting fails? Picture this: he's rocking the diaper on backward, treating the baby like a headliner at a rock concert, and scratching his head, wondering why his wife's giving him that "Did I marry the right guy?" look. 🤷  But hey, let's cut him some slack. Postpartum? It's a rollercoaster for everyone. No, seriously! 🎢  Did you know?  ⚠️1 in 10 men experience postpartum depression and anxiety issues?  ⚠️ If you have postpartum anxiety or depression that your spouse is 50% more likely to experience it themselves?  ⚠️  80% of spouses said that they were not prepared for postpartum, how to help, how to support their significant other, and how to communicate to their wives?  After surviving postpartum 3x in just 4 years, my husband and I became true postpartum pros.   We've got strategies to rock this whole postpartum thing together, and we're ready to spill the beans.  Parenthood? Not a one-person gig. You gotta be a team, on the same page, for the win. 🙌  Education is your power move, and most dads have no clue what to expect when it comes to postpartum.  I'm here to share this game-changing information with you and your husband, mama!  INTRODUCING>> The Postpartum Dad Survival Course  There has never been ANYTHING like it!   So often new mama’s don’t even have words for their wants and needs in the first days, weeks, & months postpartum!   We’re unlocking ALL the secrets, so you can turn your hubby into the MVP of your postpartum dream team.  Here’s a sneak peek at what you can look forward to…  ✨He’ll embark on your postpartum adventure with confidence, patience, and understanding as you bounce between moments of overwhelming love and sheer exhaustion.  ✨He’ll be equipped to step-up in every way as he develops clarity around how to become the Superhero of real-life parenting.  ✨He’ll up-level his ability to communicate while unlocking the secrets to a rock solid foundation for your marriage & family.   ✨As he masters the art of being fully present for you and baby, he’ll also learn how to prioritize self care (because even superheroes need to recharge!)   Not to mention he’ll have access to our mobile app where he’ll be connected to our staff as well as hundreds of other dads (in his shoes!)  Here he’ll have a safe place to ask questions, laugh, vent, and maybe even share a new dad joke.  Go ahead, tackle your 4th trimester TOGETHER with The Postpartum Dad's Survival Course!

primary_text: 15 months postpartum and still waiting to “bounce back”?  Your OB says your labs are “normal.”  Friends say, “That’s just mom life.”  But you know better.  Because normal doesn’t feel like:  😩 Fatigue that doesn’t lift no matter how much coffee you drink. 😶‍🌫️ Brain fog so heavy you forget words mid-sentence. 💔 Libido that never came back. And in over 3,300 women we’ve helped, here’s what we’ve seen:  🔎 91% had nutrient deficiencies 🔎 73% had thyroid issues 🔎 58% had inflammation that got ignored  That’s why your labs came back “fine” while you feel anything but.  DM us "RELIEF" (or comment "RELIEF" below) and we’ll help you uncover what’s really going on.

primary_text: Are you 6, 12, or even 18+ months postpartum and still experiencing mama rage, chronic fatigue, low libido, or hair loss? It’s time to get the help you NEED!  Mama, I know investing in yourself feels hard when you’re already struggling through so many side effects of postnatal depletion.   But your kiddos need you to start advocating to get the help you need (and they deserve)…  We’ve been conditioned to believe that postpartum recovery is only 6 weeks long, when in reality – it can go on for YEARS if left untreated. 😣  How you feel today (and have felt for the last few months) doesn’t feel like the woman, mama, or wife you want to be, so how much is it costing you to just accept this as “normal”?  I can tell you…  It’s stripping you of your chance to show your tiny humans the power of self-love and resilience.  It’s forcing you to miss out on precious moments where you’re fully engaged with your family because the physical, mental, and emotional effects of postpartum bog you down.   But here's the thing…  Healthy moms raise healthy kiddos, and healthy wives live in healthy homes. Period.  That’s why we’re creating generational health for postpartum moms.  Many of the mamas in our community start feeling better in as little as 30 days, and you deserve that, too.   You deserve to feel strong and energetic.   You deserve the mental clarity to focus on things you enjoy again (remember when you used to LOVE going to brunch?! 😍)   You deserve to feel like yourself again, Mama, and my team will advocate for you all the way.   This is a short-term investment for the long-term health benefits you, your tiny humans, and even your husband deserve. ad_name: SWS | Instant Form |Look a like audience 1% | Ad #2
primary_text: Having a baby is life-changing… from the moment your test turns positive to hearing their first cry and beyond.  It’s a journey with one constant: CHANGE.  And while this change brings joy and new experiences, it can also leave you feeling exhausted, overwhelmed, and far from your pre-baby self…  …The energetic, vibrant woman you always known for years…  You used to be able to tackle any challenge with enthusiasm, but now you’re struggling to get through the day.  You used to be able to enjoy gatherings and outings, but now you’re too tired to leave the house.  And you used to be able to focus and think clearly, but now you’re coping with mental fog and forgetfulness.  You’re not alone.   Many new moms experience these feelings, not just physically, but emotionally and mentally as well.  And without proper support, this can lead to long-term health issues.  My name is Stacia Scott, I’m a nurse practitioner, postnatal expert and the owner of Postpartum Care USA!  I created the "M.O.M" Method—a completely medication-free approach to postpartum recovery in 6 months or less, designed to significantly reduce your current symptoms and prevent others from occurring…  It’s the same method I’ve used to help over 500 moms just like you:  ✅ Reclaim their vitality ✅ Restore their mental alertness ✅ and Restore their emotional well-being  A step-by-step program to help you regain your sense of self…  From initial consultation to personalized follow-ups…  We guide you every step of the (medication-free) way, ensuring you receive comprehensive care tailored to your specific needs.  And the best part?  You’ll join a thriving community of moms who understand your struggle and celebrate your recovery milestones together.  So if you want to turn your postpartum journey into a story of empowerment…  Then click 'Learn more' below to start your transformation with us today!

primary_text: And we can share that recipe with you if you keep reading to the bottom!  When you become a new mama, you may experience what's called postpartum depletion syndrome. This often involves extreme fatigue, mood swings, and difficulty concentrating, which comes from the physical strain of pregnancy, childbirth, and caring for a newborn baby.  If a new mama doesn't receive proper support or self-care, postpartum depletion syndrome can impact a mother's well-being, as well as her ability to care for herself and her baby.  This is WHY we are here. Without proper treatment, those symptoms can worsen. Not only can they lead to long-term health issues, but they can also affect her ability to bond with her baby.  Addressing postpartum depletion syndrome early can help restore energy levels, improve mood, and support overall maternal health, helping with a smoother transition into motherhood.  If you feel like you could benefit from our help, CLICK BELOW to book your FREE ASSRSSMENT,  so we can help you feel better!

alternative_copy: Let me be clear on this... we can HELP!  New mamas often aren't told that childbirth depletes their bodies of crucial nutrients. This means many don't realize they need to replenish these nutrients.  Every mama is different, but the top 3 nutrients we commonly see depleted in postpartum blood work are vitamin D, ferritin, and magnesium. 🌸  If you are depleted of these nutrients, you might have symptoms such as:  **Vitamin D: •Fatigue •Mood changes, including depression •Thyroid issues •Increased risk of infections •Bone & back pain  **Ferritin (Iron Stores): •Extreme fatigue & weakness •Dizziness or lightheadedness •Cold hands & feet •Brittle nails & hair loss •Pale skin •Short of breath  **Magnesium: •Fatigue & weakness •Anxiety & depression •Hormone instability •Mood swings •Insomnia •Muscle soreness (particularly in neck and shoulders)  If you're feeling any of these after giving birth (even up to 10 years after!) DM me "RECOVERY" so we can help you feel better!

primary_text: 👉This is how you go from surviving postpartum to truly thriving and enjoying your postpartum period.   After being a nurse/nurse practitioner for 13 years and helping 100’s of mamas prevent and treat postpartum depression I have learned what it takes to help a mama THRIVE postpartum.  The key? EDUCATION.   We need to educate the entire family on what to expect and how to prevent baby blues and postpartum depression.   Most mamas have prepared for their baby and for birth…  But what about preparing for beyond birth?  Even I didn't prepare the first time around. I thought I would be equipped to handle my first born and postpartum journey without support  I was so wrong!   Nothing was what I thought it would be, from labor to breastfeeding to postpartum. alternative_copy: Having a baby is life-changing… from the moment your test turns positive to hearing their first cry and beyond.  It’s a journey with one constant: CHANGE.  And while this change brings joy and new experiences, it can also leave you feeling exhausted, overwhelmed, and far from your pre-baby self…  …The energetic, vibrant woman you always known for years…  You used to be able to tackle any challenge with enthusiasm, but now you’re struggling to get through the day.  You used to be able to enjoy gatherings and outings, but now you’re too tired to leave the house.  And you used to be able to focus and think clearly, but now you’re coping with mental fog and forgetfulness.   You’re not alone.   Many new moms experience these feelings, not just physically, but emotionally and mentally as well.  And without proper support, this can lead to long-term health issues.  My name is Stacia Scott, I’m a nurse practitioner, postnatal expert and the owner of Postpartum Care USA!  I created the "M.O.M" Method—a completely medication-free approach to postpartum recovery in 6 months or less, designed to significantly reduce your current symptoms and prevent others from occurring…  It’s the same method I’ve used to help over 500 moms just like you:  ✅ Reclaim their vitality ✅ Restore their mental alertness ✅ and Restore their emotional well-being  A step-by-step program to help you regain your sense of self…  From initial consultation to personalized follow-ups…  We guide you every step of the (medication-free) way, ensuring you receive comprehensive care tailored to your specific needs.  And the best part?  You’ll join a thriving community of moms who understand your struggle and celebrate your recovery milestones together.  So if you want to turn your postpartum journey into a story of empowerment…  Then click 'Learn more' below to start your transformation with us today!

You *still* don’t feel like yourself, and these symptoms haven’t just “gone away” like your PCP/OBGYN promised they would. 🤔  That’s because these are all signs of Postnatal Depletion Syndrome (or PND), and not only do they affect your physical health…they can also affect your mental health, too.  But at Postpartum Care USA, we get to the root cause of these symptoms so you can get back to the root of who you are (you know…fun, vibrant, free 🤍)...  DM us “HEAL” so we can help you thrive in motherhood – not just survive!

primary_text: Mama, you don't need another cute baby outfit or another baby soother. You need THIS 👇  After being a nurse/nurse practitioner for 13 years and helping 100’s of mamas prevent and treat postpartum depression I have learned what it takes to help a mama THRIVE postpartum.  The key? EDUCATION.   We need to educate the entire family on what to expect and how to prevent baby blues and postpartum depression.   Most mamas have prepared for their baby and for birth…  But what about preparing for beyond birth?  Even I didn't prepare the first time around. I thought I would be equipped to handle my first born and postpartum journey without support  I was so wrong!   Nothing was what I thought it would be, from labor to breastfeeding to postpartum.  Everything was SO hard!   Despite having a loving, supportive husband, I felt overwhelmed and alone.   That's when I realized postpartum care and support in our country was lacking, so I decided to change that!  After countless hours of research, podcasts, and studying international protocols, I've created a business helping mamas prevent and treat postpartum anxiety/depression.  Mama, I want to share this information with you!  Beyond Birth: Baby Blues and Postpartum Depression Online Course prepares you and your family for what to expect in the first days, weeks, and months postpartum so you do not have to struggle with postpartum depression.   You deserve to have a postpartum experience that allows you and your family to thrive, connect, and enjoy this short time with your precious new baby.   Get instant access for only $9 for a limited time >>  >>> https://go.ppcareusa.com/beyondbirth
